scripts.elegant: resume export big_o_elegant.pdf --theme elegant; resume export big_o_elegant.html --theme elegant
scripts.eloquent: resume export big_o_eloquent.pdf --theme eloquent; resume export big_o_eloquent.html --theme eloquent
scripts.print: resume export ./pdfs/abdelbadie_${NAME:-default}.pdf --theme onepage-updated && resume export ./sites/abdelbadie_${NAME:-default}.html --theme elegant
